columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIET_GEN_MOD6_C_NAME
columns.description: The diet modifier category ID for the order.
entries: Less than 5 years: 2oz clear liquids 2 hours pre-op
Greater than 13 years: 8oz clear liquids 2 hours pre-op
Any age: clear liquids/infant formula 6 hours pre-op

columns.name: DIET_GEN_MOD6_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the diet modifier for this row.

columns.name: DIET_GENMOD6_QST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the question record associated with the diet modifier in this row.
